name: Cribbage Solitaire Challenge
description:
Build Cribbage hands over 3 Rounds and see your final score when the Cut is revealed. Meet special requirements to unlock the Crib and score even more points. Play on your own in Solo Mode or against real opponents in the Online VS Mode. Complete Daily Challenges and compete for a spot on the leaderboard!

Features:
● Unique hand-building gameplay with traditional cribbage scoring
● Single-player or Online Multiplayer (Cross-platform)
● Complete Daily Challenges for a spot on the leaderboard
● Detailed stat-tracking and 100+ achievements
● Earn coins to unlock custom card backs, board designs, and backgrounds
● Automatic score counting
● True random shuffles

Coming Soon:
● Additional card backs, board designs, and backgrounds
● 100+ more achievements
● Higher max player level
